scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a woman, partially submerged in a large circular basin, possibly a bath. She is attended by another woman who holds a plate with round objects and a jug. Behind the bather, several figures with distinct headwear are visible, suggesting an audience or attendants. Above the scene, an arched architectural element frames the composition, with foliage and a decorative column visible. The overall impression is one of a domestic or private ritual, possibly related to bathing or preparation.
